short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ServiceNow Column ReColumn - Made By Rob Cornwall @ D2L Corporation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a quick CSS injector for users using ServiceCloud (Part of SalesForce), that will automatically increase the size of the middle column of a 3-column setup.

Made by:
Rob Cornwall
